_comment: Patches trap/environmental damage callers in BLAZE.ALL overlay code.
Real damage function at EXE 0x80024F90: damage = (maxHP * param%) / 100.
Overlay callers with hardcoded percentages: 2% (falling rocks), 5% (poison/periodic).
Multiplier scales the percentage parameter. E.g. 5x: 2%->10%, 5%->25%.
max_original_param filters out large values (combat) - only patches param <= this.
